resources.string: Touch the threads to hear different sounds
View the capacitive values of each touch sensor line
Tap twice on the touch area
Charge your Tag until the LED is pulsing white. Then, press and hold the power button on your Tag for 3 seconds to pair.
Match the last 4 digits with the serial number on the back of your Tag.

string.description: Error message for unsupported gear for LED

resources.string: Component does not support the LED capability.
Tag is detached from the gear.
Tag is not attached to the gear.
Your Jacquard product has haptic feedback
Choose Tag LED, Garment LED, or both. LEDs can be played differently based on the API.
